title: ssh.forward_agent = true not evaluated when vm.guest = windows
body:
### Vagrant version

Observed on 1.8.1 and 1.7.4, however ssh.forward_agent works properly on 1.6.5
### Host operating system

OSX El Capitan
### Guest operating system

Windows 2012R2
### Vagrantfile

``` ruby
Vagrant.configure("2") do |c|
  c.ssh.forward_agent = true
  c.ssh.insert_key = false
  c.vm.define 'win-2012R2-std' do |v|
    v.vm.hostname = 'win-2012R2-std'
    v.vm.box = 'opentable/win-2012r2-standard-amd64-nocm'
    v.vm.box_url = 'opentable/win-2012r2-standard-amd64-nocm'
    v.vm.box_check_update = 'true'
    v.vm.network :private_network, ip: "10.255.33.129", :netmask => "255.255.0.0", :mac => "080027B45925"
    v.vm.network :forwarded_port, guest: 3389, host: 3389, id: 'rdp', auto_correct: true
    v.vm.network :forwarded_port, guest: 5985, host: 5985, id: 'winrm', auto_correct: true
    v.vm.guest = :windows
    v.vm.provider :virtualbox do |vb|
      vb.customize ['modifyvm', :id, '--memory', '1024', '--cpus', '1']
    end
  end
end
```
### Debug output

```
vagrant up on 1.8.1 and 1.7.4 are the same:
18:04:48:~/git/personal/vw/devops/spec/acceptance/.vagrant/beaker_vagrant_files/win2012r2.yml
james@MacBook-Pro (add_acceptance *%)> vagrant up 
Bringing machine 'win-2012R2-std' up with 'virtualbox' provider...
==> win-2012R2-std: Importing base box 'opentable/win-2012r2-standard-amd64-nocm'...
==> win-2012R2-std: Matching MAC address for NAT networking...
==> win-2012R2-std: Checking if box 'opentable/win-2012r2-standard-amd64-nocm' is up to date...
==> win-2012R2-std: Setting the name of the VM: win2012r2yml_win-2012R2-std_1459814762312_83182
==> win-2012R2-std: Clearing any previously set network interfaces...
==> win-2012R2-std: Preparing network interfaces based on configuration...
    win-2012R2-std: Adapter 1: nat
    win-2012R2-std: Adapter 2: hostonly
==> win-2012R2-std: Forwarding ports...
    win-2012R2-std: 3389 => 3389 (adapter 1)
    win-2012R2-std: 5985 => 5985 (adapter 1)
==> win-2012R2-std: Running 'pre-boot' VM customizations...
==> win-2012R2-std: Booting VM...
==> win-2012R2-std: Waiting for machine to boot. This may take a few minutes...
    win-2012R2-std: WinRM address: 127.0.0.1:5985
    win-2012R2-std: WinRM username: vagrant
    win-2012R2-std: WinRM transport: plaintext
==> win-2012R2-std: Machine booted and ready!
==> win-2012R2-std: Checking for guest additions in VM...
==> win-2012R2-std: Setting hostname...
==> win-2012R2-std: Configuring and enabling network interfaces...
==> win-2012R2-std: Mounting shared folders...
    win-2012R2-std: /vagrant => /Users/james/git/personal/vw/devops/spec/acceptance/.vagrant/beaker_vagrant_files/win2012r2.yml
```

However on 1.6.5 ssh is appropriately forwarded:

```
==> win-2012R2-std: Importing base box 'opentable/win-2012r2-standard-amd64-nocm'...
Progress: 10%Progress: 60%Progress: 90%==> win-2012R2-std: Matching MAC address for NAT networking...
==> win-2012R2-std: Checking if box 'opentable/win-2012r2-standard-amd64-nocm' is up to date...
==> win-2012R2-std: Setting the name of the VM: win2012r2yml_win-2012R2-std_1459816054817_51738
==> win-2012R2-std: Fixed port collision for 3389 => 3389. Now on port 2200.
==> win-2012R2-std: Fixed port collision for 5985 => 5985. Now on port 2201.
==> win-2012R2-std: Fixed port collision for 22 => 2222. Now on port 2202.
==> win-2012R2-std: Clearing any previously set network interfaces...
==> win-2012R2-std: Preparing network interfaces based on configuration...
    win-2012R2-std: Adapter 1: nat
    win-2012R2-std: Adapter 2: hostonly
==> win-2012R2-std: Forwarding ports...
    win-2012R2-std: 3389 => 2200 (adapter 1)
    win-2012R2-std: 5985 => 2201 (adapter 1)
    win-2012R2-std: 22 => 2202 (adapter 1)
==> win-2012R2-std: Running 'pre-boot' VM customizations...
==> win-2012R2-std: Booting VM...
==> win-2012R2-std: Waiting for machine to boot. This may take a few minutes...
==> win-2012R2-std: Machine booted and ready!
==> win-2012R2-std: Checking for guest additions in VM...
==> win-2012R2-std: Setting hostname...
==> win-2012R2-std: Configuring and enabling network interfaces...
==> win-2012R2-std: Mounting shared folders...
    win-2012R2-std: /vagrant => /Users/james/git/personal/vw/devops/.vagrant/beaker_vagrant_files/win2012r2.yml
```
### Expected behavior

SSH should have been forwarded appropriately. 
### Actual behavior

SSH is not forwarded on most recent releases. However SSH is forwarded appropriately when guest os type != windows
### Steps to reproduce
1. configure windows guest os vagrant file, enable ssh.forward_agent, 
2. vagrant up
